name: The Janitor Game
description:
Being a Janitor has never been so intense!

I made this game several years ago in middle school. It is one of my best works. I published it on Newgrounds and Kongregate at the time, but now I made an itch.io account, so why not put it here too.

*the game is known to run twice as fast on some monitors with higher refresh rates. I tried to fix it. Other people who made games using GameMaker Studio 2 had this problem as well, so the problem is in the engine.

Music by Jack Renaud (GameMaker Studio 2 asset store)
Some sound effects by Joshua Wayne (GameMaker Studio 2 asset store)
The rest by me!
